addBuildLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.AtlasPower
This method extends the default build layer, added the possibility to place dome also on construction on level 0, 1, 2.
addBuildLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.DemeterPower
It is a normal build layer, but it negate to added the piece on the same building of the first build layer.
addBuildLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.HephaestusPower
It adds the possibility to place a piece on the same building of the first build layer.
addBuildLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.HestiaPower
It adds the possibility to place a piece on the center spaces.
addBuildLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.PowerStrategy
calls the default private recursive method to construct a build layer
addBuildLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.PrometheusPower
It can append build action on root
addBuildLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.ZeusPower
It adds the possibility to build under the worker.
addChild(ActionTree) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.ActionTree
adds a child node to this node
addGodPlayer(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.PlayersMenu
It sets the god in the menu on the right player
addMoveLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.ApolloPower
Unlike the basic method it can generate forced moves when the worker moves on a space where there is an opponent's worker swapping the two workers
addMoveLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.ArtemisPower
It is a normal moved and checks that the worker with an hypothetical second move doesn't came back in the same space at the start on the turn.
addMoveLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.MinotaurPower
Unlike the basic method it can generate forced moves when the worker moves on a space where there is an opponent's worker pushing the last one on the straight forward behind space on the forced move target
addMoveLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.PanPower
It adds another win condition if the worker goes down of two or more levels in the move action.
addMoveLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.PowerStrategy
calls the defaults private recursive method to construct a move layer
addMoveLayer(ActionTree, Player, Board) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.PrometheusPower
If the move action is appended on an build action the worker can't go up.

addPlayer(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Model
